node.title: Waitangi Day: Treaty grounds will be closed to the public
node.description: The Waitangi Treaty Grounds will be closed to the public on Waitangi Day.
node.content:
["", "
File photo. Photo: 123rf.com
", "It follows an early decision to cancel in-person events usually held at the site.", "Waitangi National Trust chair Pita Tipene said after receiving advice the estate and treaty grounds will be now be closed to the public.", "But the trust would work with broadcasters to deliver a virtual Waitangi Day experience, he said.", "More to come..."]
